title: Issues logging in
body:
I am having issues logging into the OCE client as of the new arurf mode going live as part of the vs. event. I am stuck on authenticating for 90% of attempts, and in the one in ten attempts that the log in does go through I am greeted with the attempting to reconnect dialogue seen above. This issue is exclusive to OCE as I have no issues logging into the NA client or the PBE client.

EDIT: nope I just got logged out of the NA client, PBE client is fine still though.
